attributes.action: INSTATE THE DEATH PENALTY FOR ALL CONVICTED CHILD RAPISTS AND CHILD MURDERS
attributes.additional_details:
WE WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO INSTATE THE KING JAMES BIBLE LAW OF THE DEATH PENALTY FOR ALL CONVICTED CHILD RAPISTS AND CHILD MURDERERS

Jesus Christ is very clear THERE IS BUT ONE PUNISHMENT for child rapist and child murderers - THEY MUST BE PUT TO DEATH. The church demands the death penalty.

All sins are NOT forgiven: All children believe in Christ - since all children go to heaven when they die and we are called to have hearts like little children - hence the death sentence:
[King James Bible] Mat 18:6  But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me, it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea.

Child rape and child murder is the 'sin unto death':
[King James Bible] 1Jn 5:16  If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.
